sense.gloss: to be confined to one's bed, to be laid up

sdata.j: ↑女↑↓おんな↓の↑子↑↓こ↓は↑頭痛↑↓ずつう↓で|↑寝込↑↓ねこ↓む|のが↑嫌↑↓きら↓いです。
sdata.e: Girls hate being laid up in bed because of a headache.

sdata.j: ↑女↑↓おんな↓の↑子↑↓こ↓は↑頭痛↑↓ずつう↓で|↑寝込↑↓ねこ↓む|のが↑嫌↑↓きら↓いです。
sdata.e: The girl hates being laid up in bed because of a headache.
